solution_line_template: After buying {packs_to_buy} more packs, Michael is going to have {initial_packs} packs + {packs_to_buy} packs = <<{initial_packs}+{packs_to_buy}={total_packs}>>{total_packs} packs of crayons.
In total all packs are going to be worth {total_packs} packs * ${pack_price}/pack = $<<{total_packs}*{pack_price}={total_worth}>>{total_worth}.
